categories: Category:Battles of the Dark Nest Crisis

nodes.text: The Raid on Supply Depot Thrago was a ploy by Jacen Solo to start a war between The Colony and the Chiss. The six Jedi launched a preemptive strike to push the Chiss to war to stop Jacen's vision from coming to pass. The Jedi damaged the fuel and guns on the depot, and Jacen attempted a risky maneuver that nearly killed 100 Chiss. After the raid Jaina Solo vowed never to fly with her brother again. After the raid the Chiss launched an attack on Snevu and the Swarm War had begun.
